heading: NASAT |2013 | 4 | 10 | Science | Biology | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Answer some questions about an important neural process, for 10 points each: [10] This neural process begins with rapid depolarization in the rising phase. The firing frequency of this process reflects the magnitude of the depolarizing current, and it is followed by the absolute refractory period.
